unfit.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: not in a good physical condition
unfit.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She never gets any exercise â€“ she must be really unfit.
unfit.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: not good enough to do something or to be used for a particular purpose
unfit.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption (=not suitable to eat).
The house was unfit for human habitation (=not good enough to live in).
Jenkins is unfit for public office.
Hubbard was declared mentally unfit to stand trial.
